text.div:
BC LeftRightLateralityCS CodeSystem

Simplified set of laterality codes indicating detailing the side(s) of interest. Codes are from NCI

name: LeftRightLateralityCS
title: BC LeftRightLateralityCS CodeSystem
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC).
description: Simplified set of laterality codes indicating detailing the side(s) of interest. Codes are from NCI

concept.definition: LEFT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
concept.display: LEFT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.

concept.definition: RIGHT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
concept.display: RIGHT Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
